sentences.english: No suspected cancer cells or cancer cells were found.

sentences.english: By recognizing the changing characteristics of your cervical mucus, you can predict when you'll ovulate.

sentences.english: Methods 108 gynecological patients with chronic cervicitis were chosen.

sentences.english: Abdominal tenderness is noted, and pelvic examination reveals cervical motion tenderness.

sentences.english: Induced abortion with Rivanol is still mainly choice for intermediate pregnancy (>16 weeks).

sentences.english: Treatment of asymptomatic women with trichomonads noted on liquid-based cervical cytology is recommended.

sentences.english: The use of extra-amniotic saline infusion with a balloon catheter or a double balloon catheter (Atad ripener) also appears to be effective for cervical ripening.
sentences.chinese: 用羊膜外单或双气囊氏导管也是宫颈成熟的有效方法。

sentences.english: LEEP is an effective way to prevent the generation of cervical carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: LEEP是阻断宫颈癌发生的有效手段。

sentences.english: Conclusion Bohm infrared light could have significant effect on chronic cervicitis.

sentences.english: Objective To analysis the characteristics and clinical features of uterine neoplasms developed after radiation therapy for cervical carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析宫颈癌放疗后子宫体恶性肿瘤的临床特点。

sentences.english: However, most cervical squamous carcinomas are non-keratinizing.

sentences.english: Results FHIT gene expressed in all of the chronic cervicitis tissue (100%).
